name: handled by
description:
This is 'handled by', a new video game from Outhouse Media. It is important to note that Thomas Fordham, one of the founders of companies like Star Wars: Battlefront, has been named to Outhouse Media's Board of Directors.
The last ten years have seen the development of this type of games growing exponentially. There has been an overwhelming amount of data that point towards the fact that console players are far more likely to spend hours in front of a game now than they were just a decade ago. Take, for instance, anecdotal evidence that suggests that online gaming and social media engagement are two of the most prevalent forms of social impact in today's game-playing community. Thomas Fordham What social impact? I'd imagine many expect that video games are the primary form of social impact, but it seems that the problem is more than that. According to the US Federal Election Commission, the average consumer spends no more than 20 minutes doing something in a single day. And it's not just that the gaming media, and most people, are not attuned to this fact. In an interview with the New York Times, former Vice President of Social Media for Electronic Arts, who is no stranger to the social reporting aspects of video games, mentioned that he has noticed that the culture of video games has not changed as drastically as he believes it has.
